Description: Sets the name of the server that appears in the server list
DefaultValue: AMP Powered The Ship: Murder Party Server

Description: If enabled, the server will operate as a LAN server: no heartbeat, no authentication, no non-class C addresses, 9999.0 rate, etc
Sets the password required to connect to the server. Default is no password
Sets the map to start the server with. If "Custom" is selected, Custom Initial Map must also be specified
Sets a custom map to use for the Initial Map, if "Custom" is selected
Sets the server region shown in the server browser
Sets the maximum number of players allowed on the server at one time
Sets the maximum players reported to prospective clients, regardless of the Player Limit. -1 = do not override
If set, server side preloading will be forced
If set, cheat convars will be allowed to be used on the server
If set, Valve Anti-Cheat (VAC) will be disabled
If set, clients will be allowed to download content from the server (maps, sprays and related)
Sets the URL(s) for clients to download custom content from, instead of sourcing the content from the server. This allows for faster downloads
If set, clients will be allowed to upload customisation files to the server
Sets the minimum allowable bandwidth rate a client may have set when connected to the server. 0 = no minimum
Sets the maximum allowable bandwidth rate a client may have set when connected to the server. 0 = no limit
Sets the minimum number of updates per second of the positions of the server's models (players, guns, etc) that server sends to clients
Sets the maximum number of updates per second of the positions of the server's models (players, guns, etc) that server sends to clients
If set, CPU stats will be collected

If required, you can change the IPv4 IP binding of the server and RCON by changing the 'Server IP Address' setting under Security and Privacy. NOTE: AMP requires the server to be bound to a specific IP, rather than 0.0.0.0, for the server to log to AMP's console. The IP must also be reachable by AMP
If set, enables packet filtering by IP mode. If disabled, everyone will treated as IP-banned, but their IP won't be added to the banlist
Sets the time before a client is dropped after loss of communication
If enabled, server bans will be logged in the server log

Specifies additional [command line parameters](https://developer.valvesoftware.com/wiki/Command_line_options#Command-Line_Parameters_6) (anything that begins with a -) that are not otherwise set by AMP. Use with care

Specifies additional [console variables](https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=189354886) (anything that begins with a +) that are not otherwise set by AMP. Use with care. Preferably, specify the equivalent under "Additional Server Settings"
Specifies additional [settings](https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=189354886) to include in "server.cfg" that are not otherwise set by AMP. One setting per line
If set, cooperative play will be enabled
If set, deathmatch will be enabled
Sets the maximum speed any ballistically moving object is allowed to attain per axis
Sets the world gravity
Sets the player friction. Setting this to a negative number will cause out-of-range errors
Sets the player acceleration
Sets the player air acceleration
Sets the player water acceleration
Sets the water friction
Sets the minimum stopping speed when on the ground
Sets the damage inflicted from falls
If enabled, weapons will stay (immediate pickup by players without weapons), Requires that there be additional ammo (can't pick up a weapon to get more ammo)
If enabled, forces players to respawn after death
Sets the maximum speed that a player can move at when on the ground
If set, friendly fire will be enabled (teammates can cause damage to other teammates)
If set, footstep sounds will be enabled
If set, players will be able to pause the server. Enabling this is not recommended
If enabled, voice communication for the server will be allowed
If enabled, players can communicate with all other players, with no team restrictions
Sets the voice codec used for in-game voice communication
Sets the team balancing mode
Sets the time period between map rotations. 0 = disabled
Sets the maximum number of rounds to play before the map rotates. 0 = disabled
Sets the frag limit (number of kills) before the map rotates. 0 = disabled
If set, teamplay will be enabled
If sets, allows the use of the flashlight by pressing the F button
If set, NPCs will be enabled
If set, auto crosshair will be enabled
If set, players will be allowed to join the server as spectators
The value to multiply the server's sv_accelerate value by for spectators in noclip mode
Sets the speed multiplier for spectators in noclip mode
If set, enables noclip mode for spectators
This sets the amount of players allowed on the spectator team
If set, SourceTV will be disabled on the server
Sets SourceTV name as it appears in server browser and scoreboard
If set, all games will be recorded as SourceTV demos
Sets the maximum number of clients allowed to connect to the server's SourceTV. 0 = no SourceTV viewers are allowed, the game will only be recorded locally
Sets the time the SourceTV stream will be delayed (in seconds)
If set, delays the server from changing maps until the broadcast is complete
Sets the maximum SourceTV spectator bandwidth rate allowed. 0 = unlimited
Sets required password for connecting spectators. Default is no password
If enabled, allow player voice chat if broadcasted
If enabled, the whole game is transmitted and spectators can switch their view to any player they want
Sets the time before specators can send another message in chat (in seconds)
Sets Source client dispatch mode for connecting clients: 0=never, 1=if appropriate, 2=always

Sets how to manage Metamod and SourceMod on the server. Branch and Build Versions must be set accordingly for installation. Update the server after changing this setting (unless "Do nothing" is selected)
Specifies the [Metamod](https://www.sourcemm.net/downloads.php) branch to install
Specifies the [Metamod build version](https://www.sourcemm.net/downloads.php) to install
Specifies the [SourceMod](https://www.sourcemod.net/downloads.php) branch to install
Specifies the [SourceMod build version](https://www.sourcemod.net/downloads.php) to install
Sets the initial game mode to start the server with.
Number of seconds between the updates for Quarry Hints (0 = off)

DisplayName: Update interval in World Leader Modes
Description: Number of seconds until next update in World Leaders Modes (0 = Off)
Sets whether the Quarry compass is enabled
Sets whether the World Leader Quarry compass is enabled
Enable Bots for the server
Determines whether bots will join regardless of an active player
number of players in the kill loop
number of bots allowed
Duration in minutes before map cycle
Duration in minutes of each game to be played in the specified game mode
Duration in seconds to wait before the map starts
Duration in seconds to wait before the round restarts
Duration in seconds to wait before the round restarts
Amount of money required for a victory condition
Amount of witnesses required for a player to be arrested
Time in seconds before player is arrested while being witnessed (by number of witnesses)
Tickup rate for player needs
Number of innocent kills before a player is warned

DisplayName: Innocent kills before being kicked and banned
Description: Number of innocent kills before a player is kicked and banned
Bank balance required before a player is warned

DisplayName: Bank Balance before kick and ban
Description: Bank balance required before a player is kicked and banned
Duration in minutes for which players are kicked/banned
Duration in minutes for which players are kicked/banned after a vote
Sets whether the Votekick system is disabled
Sets whether the Map Vote system is disabled
Sets whether the gamemode voting system is enabled
Duration in seconds in which a player must wait before calling another vote
Sets whether the gamemode is randomized per Map
Sets whether the gamemode is reset back to the mode specified in the config file when the map changes
If set, the automatic team balancing feature will be disabled
Maximum amount of teams allowed, the default and minimum is 4 for Unassigned, passengers and Team 1/2
Maximum amount of bot teams allowed, the bots will evenly balance between the available teams to help accommodate gameplay

If required, you can change the IPv4 IP binding of the server and RCON by changing the 'Server IP Address' setting under Security and Privacy. NOTE: AMP requires the server to be bound to a specific IP, rather than 0.0.0.0, for the server to log to AMP's console. The IP must also be reachable by AMP
Specifies additional command line parameters that are not otherwise set by AMP. Use with care
Specifies additional console variables (anything that begins with a +) that are not otherwise set by AMP. Use with care.
Specifies additional settings to include in 'server.cfg' that are not otherwise set by AMP. One setting per line

Sets how to manage Metamod and SourceMod on the server. Branch and Build Versions must be set accordingly for installation. Update the server after changing this setting (unless "Do nothing" is selected)
Specifies the [Metamod](https://www.sourcemm.net/downloads.php) branch to install
Specifies the [Metamod build version](https://www.sourcemm.net/downloads.php) to install
Specifies the [SourceMod](https://www.sourcemod.net/downloads.php) branch to install
Specifies the [SourceMod build version](https://www.sourcemod.net/downloads.php) to install
